deployments.name: ESCU Default Configuration Anomaly
deployments.author: Patrick Bareiss
deployments.description: This configuration file applies to all detections of type anomaly. These detections will use Risk Based Alerting.

deployments.name: ESCU Default Configuration Baseline
deployments.author: Patrick Bareiss
deployments.description: This configuration file applies to all detections of type baseline.

deployments.name: ESCU Default Configuration Correlation
deployments.author: Patrick Bareiss
deployments.description: This configuration file applies to all detections of type Correlation. These correlations will generate Notable Events.

deployments.name: ESCU Default Configuration Hunting
deployments.author: Patrick Bareiss
deployments.description: This configuration file applies to all detections of type hunting.

deployments.name: ESCU Default Configuration TTP
deployments.author: Patrick Bareiss
deployments.description: This configuration file applies to all detections of type TTP. These detections will use Risk Based Alerting and generate Notable Events.

deployments.name: Detect ARP Poisoning deployment configuration
deployments.author: Mikael Bjerkeland
deployments.description: This configuration file applies to the Detect ARP Poisoning detection

notable.rule_description: ARP Poisoning has been detected on interface $src_interface$ on host $orig_host$. This may be an indication of a MITM attack.

deployments.name: Detect Rogue DHCP Server deployment configuration
deployments.author: Mikael Bjerkeland
deployments.description: This configuration file applies to the Detect Rogue DHCP Server detection

notable.rule_description: DHCP Snooping has detected a Rogue DHCP Server on $orig_host$ from $src_mac$. This may be an indication of a MITM attack.

deployments.name: Baseline Cache Hourly Updates
deployments.author: Bhavin Patel
deployments.description: This configuration file applies to all baselines with tag deployments Hourly Cache Updates

deployments.name: Baseline Cache Daily Updates
deployments.author: David Dorsey
deployments.description: This configuration file applies to all baselines with tag deployments Daily Cache Updates

deployments.name: 90 Day Baseline Searches
deployments.author: Bhavin Patel
deployments.description: This configuration file applies to all baselines with tag deployments Long Running Baseline

deployments.name: Weekly Model Rebuild 90 Day Lookback
deployments.author: David Dorsey
deployments.description: This configuration file applies to all baselines with tag deployments Weekly Model Rebuild 90 Day Lookback
